extDescription.message: Find out about the location, ip address, timezone, currency and other information about the websites you visit!

extra@permission_missing.message: You didn't grant the <$PERMISSION$> permission. Please enable it to use this feature.

only_supported_by_firefox.description: Feature is only supported by Firefox.

extra@text@error_occurred.message: There was an error. We are sorry.
extra@text@error_occurred.description: Error text when data couldn't be loaded.

extra@text@is_loading.description: Text when data is being loaded.

extra@text@save_now.description: Text when a form can be saved.

extension@hover_title@is_onion_service.description: User hovers over icon on an onion service.

pages@popup@is_local_host@text.message: This is your PC. Welcome home.
pages@popup@is_local_host@text.description: User is on an offline-browser site.

pages@popup@is_onion_address@text.message: This is an onion service. You can't find out it's location.
pages@popup@is_onion_address@text.description: User is on an Onion service. These are server, whose location can't be determined.

pages@popup@flag_image@alt_text.description: Alternative image description text for country flag

pages@popup@clock@your_time.description: Text of clock of user's time

pages@popup@clock@server_time.description: Text of clock of server's time

pages@popup@clock@user_uses_resist_finge.message: Hint: You have enabled 'privacy.resistFingerprinting' in the 'about:config' settings. Firefox won't give us your real timezone, so time might be offset.
pages@popup@clock@user_uses_resist_finge.description: User has enabled fingerprinting resisting and this should make them aware of it.

pages@popup@information@ip_address@label.description: Title of information box of server's ip address.
Title of information box of server's ip address.

pages@popup@information@organisation@lab.description: Title of information box of the server's internet organisation.

pages@popup@information@isp@label.description: Title of information box of the server's internet service provider.

pages@popup@information@timezone@label.description: Title of information box of the server's country timezone.

pages@popup@information@currency@label.description: Title of information box of the server's country currency.

pages@popup@information@canonical_name@n.message: Please grant the <dns> permission to use this feature.

pages@popup@extra@create_bug_report.description: Button which allows to copy a report which can be pasted in a bug report.

pages@options@form@allow_search_bar_icon.description: Form label of the show icon in search bar field.

pages@options@form@query_api_url@label.description: Form label of the query api url.

pages@options@form@query_api_url@descrip.message: If you are hosting your own API, enter your base domain here. If you don't know what this is, don't change this field.
pages@options@form@query_api_url@descrip.description: Form label of the query api url.
